item.title: PODCAST: Ubisoft And Tencent Have A Deal, GTA 6 Release Questions, and An Exclusive Game Announcement
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/podcast-ubisoft-and-tencent-have-a-deal-gta-6-release-questions-and-an-exclusive-game-announcement/

Ubisoft is making major changes in a deal with Tencent, Nintendo holds its last Switch 1 Direct, and GTA 6 needs to make a release date decision. It’s Insider Gaming Weekly: A Video Game Podcast for March 28, 2025.

Insider Gaming’s Mike Straw, Grant Tayler-Hill, and Albert Perkins are joined for the full episode by editor-in-chief Tom Henderson this week to talk about the biggest news from a busy week in gaming. They also talk about whether Call of Duty Warzone can be saved with Season 3, Tom’s trip to GDC 2025 in San Francisco, and exclusively reveal a new game in development from an unexpected IP.

It’s the biggest episode ever of Insider Gaming Weekly!

If you enjoy the show, please consider subscribing wherever you listen to your favorite shows (links below), and leave a rating and review. You can also submit questions for future shows and your feedback to ⁠[email protected]⁠.

Subscribe To Insider Gaming Weekly: A Video Game Podcast

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5ZUR0ceSgsypXkiCjCCNMa

Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/insider-gaming-weekly-a-video-game-podcast/id1792334405

iHeartRadio: https://www.iheart.com/podcast/269-insider-gaming-weekly-a-vi-260791941/

Amazon Music: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/af55ef9d-5255-4f72-a2a0-50bf333e8dc4/insider-gaming-weekly-a-video-game-podcast

Pocket Casts: https://pca.st/oem3367c

About The Show

Each and every Friday, Senior Editors Mike Straw and Grant Taylor-Hill alongside Senior Producer Albert Perkins bring you the latest in video game news, events, rumors and more.

From friendly debates to challenges for the audience and each other, you don’t want to miss a single thing from Insider Gaming Weekly. Even Insider Gaming Co-Founder Tom Henderson will stop by from time to time to talk the latest in gaming rumors that players need to know about.

Don’t forget to share the show and leave a rating to help us grow this new venture. You can also submit questions for future shows and your feedback to ⁠[email protected]⁠.

Join the Discussion

If you want to talk about the latest episode of the show with the hosts and staff—and talk the Ubisoft/Tencent deal, Call of Duty changes, GTA 6’s release date, and anything else—, head on over to the Insider Gaming Forums where you can hangout with other gamers and listeners, and talk about everything from your favorite games and shows to even sharing your best in-game artwork. It’s all there at the Insider Gaming Forums.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
